name: node-js-typescript-template
description: Node js typescript template with eslint, prettier, standard version, jest and vs code settings.
author: Wunna

scripts.release:major: standard-version --release-as major && git push --follow-tags && git push && npm run build
scripts.release:minor: standard-version --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags && git push && npm run build
scripts.release:patch: standard-version --release-as patch && git push --follow-tags && git push && npm run build
